1.label: Store should be set to development
1.bodyText: Set to development to avoid any issues with live store

1.label: Correct fee tiers if needed
1.bodyText: Double check onboarding notes about different fee tiers, and check if necessary to change

1.label: Set correct widget type and variant
Check for any extra options to add in widget config
1.bodyText: These can be items like opt in condition, or a render after/below

2.label: Check that product is out of all collections
!IMPORTANT! Check store and search for SavedBy
2.bodyText: Check Shop All, Featured, Recommendations, and use search bar of store. If found on live site, set product to draft

2.label: Duplicate Theme has [SavedBy mm/dd/yyyy] format at end

3.label: SavedBy Product hidden in cart
3.bodyText: No SavedBy product on any cart pages, double check it does not show on changes.

3.label: Cart totals show without SavedBy
3.bodyText: Subtotal and cart count are not including SavedBy.

3.label: Product hidden in collections
3.bodyText: Check recommendations, collections, and other possibilities of our product being shown.

3.label: Check help icon popup
3.bodyText: Ensure no styles are effecting our pop up.

3.label: Styles fit on store
3.bodyText: Check all widths and ensure the widget does not break/look off on the store.

3.label: Test on major browsers
3.bodyText: Check on safari, firefox, google, and mobile options.
